headline: Manchester's Most
Sought-After Tattoo Studio
hero.subheadline: Where creative vision meets technical mastery. Custom designs that tell your story with uncompromising quality and artistic excellence.
hero.imageAlt: The Studio Afflecks artist creating a custom tattoo

portfolio.subtitle: Every piece is a unique work of art, crafted with precision and passion

sessions.subtitle: Professional tattooing services tailored to your vision

testimonials.quote: Alex's attention to detail is incredible. My sleeve turned out better than I ever imagined. The studio atmosphere is welcoming and professional.
testimonials.author: Sarah M.

testimonials.quote: Been to many studios but The Studio Afflecks is on another level. The artistry and professionalism here is unmatched. Highly recommend!
testimonials.author: James T.

paragraphs: With over 8 years of experience in the tattoo industry, Alex has established The Studio Afflecks as Manchester's premier destination for custom tattoo artistry. Specializing in detailed black and grey realism, neo-traditional, and fine line work, Alex brings a unique artistic vision to every piece.

After training under renowned artists across Europe, Alex opened The Studio Afflecks with a mission to create a welcoming space where art and professionalism intersect. Every tattoo is approached as a collaborative masterpiece, ensuring each client receives a truly personal and exceptional experience.
about.callout: Every tattoo tells a story - let's create yours together.
about.imageAlt: Alex Affleck, founder and lead artist at The Studio Afflecks

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 2-3 months in advance, especially for larger pieces or custom designs. Consultation appointments are typically available within 2-3 weeks.

items.question: What's included in the consultation fee?
items.answer: The £80 consultation includes a detailed discussion of your vision, custom design creation, placement advice, and sizing recommendations. This fee is credited toward your tattoo session when you book.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Start Your Tattoo Journey?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your consultation today and let's create something extraordinary together

booking.modalDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for your interest! We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit is required to secure your booking and will be deducted from your final session cost.
